Package command

Class MakeBlockCommand

java.lang.Object
command.MakeBlockCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class MakeBlockCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
A class that holds all the information about the action where a block is made. This information consists of the objects block and GameController. The class also specifies what must happen to undo and execute this command.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MakeBlockCommand​(GameController GC, PresentationBlock<?> block)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void execute()
    Executes this command and makes the required changes for this command.
    void undo()
    Undoes this command and makes the required changes for this Command.This command can be a connectingCommand, disconnectingCommand, MakeBlock, drag Block etc.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MakeBlockCommand

      public MakeBlockCommand​(GameController GC, PresentationBlock<?> block)
      Makes a Command for the creation of a block. This holds the info to undo and redo this action.
      Parameters:
      blockToConnectTo - Block before group of blocks connected.
      blockToConnect - First block of group of blocks that gets connected.
